name: Hemlock
description:
Your car was driven off the road.

They took your daughter for a dark ritual.

Save your family. Survive the night.

controls:
wasd to move
mouse to look
click to attack
shift to run

team:
development: billy monks
art: lowlande4k
music: J.P. Mensching
additional art and audio: Kidd Frog

credits:
CTS by Procedural Worlds
Fantasy Skybox
The Shed by BlackantMasterStudio
House by Quaternius
Sound Effects by Maoudamashii
Wind sound by metrostock99
goresplat by thefitzyg

-

Game is in development... target release Halloween or beyond
